doc:
Jean Becker (director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean_Becker_(director) 0 Jean Becker (born 10 May 1933) is a French film director, screenwriter and actor. He is son of the director Jacques Becker. Jean_Becker ( born 10_May_1933 ) is a_French_film_director , screenwriter_and_actor . He is son of the_director_Jacques_Becker .
